Text: IntraZonal CongestionBill NonPrivilegedpst The ISO is experiencing increasing loading on the PittsburgTassaraja kV line and requires additional decremental energy bids on the north side of the path and incremental energy bids on the south side of the path To the extent that Scheduling Coordinators do not respond with sufficient energy bids to mitigate the anticipated congestion the ISO may invoke the other steps of the IntraZonal Congestion Management Procedure Sent by Market Operations The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

Incorrect Expost pricesBill NonPrivilegedpst Due to ISO computer problems the Hour Ending ExPost price for is not correct The minute interval prices for interval and are also incorrect The correct ExPost price for Hour Ending will be posted with in the next hours Sent by Market Operations The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

OASIS Real time market informationBill NonPrivilegedpst Real time market information for HE and HE will be corrected within hours Sent by ISO Market Operations The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

BEEP Normal unsplitBill NonPrivilegedpst Internal path flows are now below limits BEEP has been returned to normal mode unsplit operation as of hours BEEP will dispatch as one zone Sent by Market Operations inquiries please call the Real Time Desk GUY Ridgely OLEObj Grid Resource Coordinator

Path Bill NonPrivilegedpst Path NS flows are near the limit BEEP has been put into split region mode as of hours BEEP will dispatch in two zones and will produce two ExPost prices Sent by Market Operations inquiries please call the Real Time Desk GUY Ridgely OLEObj Grid Resource Coordinator Tel Bp email OLEObj

Path Bill NonPrivilegedpst Path SN flows are near the limit BEEP has been put into split region mode as of hours BEEP will dispatch in two zones and will produce two ExPost prices Sent by Market Operations inquiries please call the Real Time Desk The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice
